title: Moondance
marks: Signature, Date, Title and Inscription On bottom, incised: [#702/ \"MOON DANCE\"/ VERA WOOD
description: vessel with small flat foot, flaring outward and in again at steep shoulder; flush mouth; curved ribs over body
creditline: Gift of funds from Mrs. Eunice Dwan and The Greenberg Foundation, Daniel Greenberg, and Susan Steinhauser, from the Robert Law Collection
